column4: can anyone help me to install Android Development Tool in eclipse galileo? am using ubuntu 10.04
Did you already download the linux packages for it?
But whenever i try to install ADT i get error

Missing requirement: Android Development Tools 8.0.1.v201012062107-82219 (com.android.ide.eclipse.adt.feature.group 8.0.1.v201012062107-82219) requires 'org.eclipse.wst.sse.core 0.0.0' but it could not be found
this is wen i tried ADT 8.0
Have you rebooted the system after installation of the development tools?
Abhijit: You may have hardware problems.
Did you check your version of Eclipse.
Abhijit: How long did you run the memory test for?
I'm sure we're missing something but I don't know what it is. Sorry.
